overview: The first Pléhouse skiing video ever! The whole project was started in 2001 by three well-known pro freeskiers - Phil Larose, Thomas Rinfret and Phil Bélanger. EXACT SCIENCE brings you the progression of freeskiing from another angle... The Pros angle. Pléhouse is proud to bring you something fresh and new - something you have been waiting for!
title: Exact Science
